700289f-a.title: Bronx: 187th Street (East) - Lorillard Place
700289f-a.text:
E. 187th Street (left), at the N.W. corner of Lorillard Place,
showing the St. John the Baptist Church (Italian).
May 4, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700290f-a.title: Bronx: 187th Street (East) - Lorillard Place
700290f-a.text:
E. 187th Street, north side, west from Lorillard Place to
Third Avenue.
May 4, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
NO RER(ODUCTIONS.
